articles.description: All the reaction and analysis as Manchester City beat Aston Villa in the race for the Premier League's top-five, before build-up to Arsenal's match against Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Man City strike late winner against Aston Villa

articles.description: Follow live action and updates from the 2025 World Snooker Championship  at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2025 LIVE: Shaun Murphy vs Daniel Wells, Zhang Anda vs Pang Junxu - stream, scores, results

articles.description: Conor Benn will finally face bitter rival Chris Eubank Jr at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Saturday.
articles.title: Eubank vs Benn: Inside Conor Benn's camp ahead of fight with Chris Eubank Jr

articles.description: Marcus Rashford feels it is unlikely he will play for Manchester United again under Ruben Amorim, but will not rush a decision on his future.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Striker feels it unlikely he will play for Manchester United again under Ruben Amorim

articles.description: Simone Biles, the world's most-decorated gymnast, says she is unsure if she will compete at the 2028 Olympics in Los Angeles.
articles.title: Simone Biles undecided on competing at 2028 Olympics in Los Angeles

articles.description: Open champion Xander Schauffele is backing Rory McIlroy to quickly add to his five majors now he has completed the Grand Slam.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Grand Slam winner could be 'scary' at Royal Portrush Open - Schauffele

articles.description: France scrum-half Nolann le Garrec says his reaction to a slight head contact in Racing 92's defeat by Perpignan was "inadequate".
articles.title: Nolann le Garrec: France scrum-half sorry for dive on Racing 92 duty

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz speaks about comparisons with his hero Rafael Nadal and his fears that tennis will become an "obligation", rather than fun.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz on Rafael Nadal comparisons, Ibiza trips and dealing with expectation

articles.description: Former England striker Eni Aluko says her broadcasting career has been damaged because of her ongoing legal case with ex-Newcastle and Manchester City midfielder Joey Barton.
articles.title: Eni Aluko: 'My career has been hit by standing up to Joey Barton'
